overview: Nusa Antara (The Nusantara) is an animated documentary short film, which records the ideas and dialogues of each director involved (film director, animation director, sound director) related to childhood memories, and/or past memories about what it means to live and live in Indonesia.  Indonesia, an archipelagic country, highlighting illegal logging, romance, COVID-19, and life in the countryside.
title: Nusa Antara
